prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with fluffy clouds as wings and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a small, aqua-colored Pokemon that resembles a bird and loves to soar in the sky.
Imagine a cute Pokemon with light blue feathers and a soft, fluffy appearance.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a clear blue sky and playful clouds.
Show me a bird-like Pokemon with striking blue colors and a friendly personality.
Make a Pokemon that has a light and airy feel, perfect for gliding through grassy fields.
Give me a whimsical Pokemon that has both wings and a charming, fluffy body.
